H0.text: Electrochemical impulses travel from neuron to neuron as information is transmitted.

H1.text: RNA strands travel from neuron to neuron as information is transmitted.

H2.text: Transport vesicles high in ATP travel from neuron to neuron as information is transmitted.

H3.text: Mechanical forces are what travel from neuron to neuron as information is transmitted.

A4.text: The action potential generated at the axon hillock propagates as a wave along the axon.

A5.text: The arrival of the action potential opens voltageâ€‘sensitive calcium channels in the presynaptic membrane; the influx of calcium causes vesicles filled with neurotransmitter to migrate to the cell's surface and release their contents into the synaptic cleft.
